body_html:
Thank you for clarification. That is what I did (adjusted nn.yaml, and SpatialConvolutionMM.c/ .cu)

However, those files THCUNN.h, THNN.h also needed to be updated.

Moreover, variable names in the yaml files and previously mentioned header files must be chosen such that parser (gen.py, nn_parse.py, native_parse.py) can match them.

I think that should be added to the ATen readme. It took us (3 CS Students) three full days to figure out why our code did not compile.
body_text:
Thank you for clarification. That is what I did (adjusted nn.yaml, and SpatialConvolutionMM.c/ .cu)
However, those files THCUNN.h, THNN.h also needed to be updated.
Moreover, variable names in the yaml files and previously mentioned header files must be chosen such that parser (gen.py, nn_parse.py, native_parse.py) can match them.
I think that should be added to the ATen readme. It took us (3 CS Students) three full days to figure out why our code did not compile.
body:
Thank you for clarification. That is what I did (adjusted `nn.yaml`, and `SpatialConvolutionMM.c/ .cu`)

 However, those files [THCUNN.h](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THCUNN/generic/THCUNN.h#L562), [THNN.h](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/THNN/generic/THNN.h#L527) also needed to be updated. 

Moreover, variable names in the yaml files and previously mentioned header files must be chosen such that parser ([gen.py](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/gen.py), [nn_parse.py](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/nn_parse.py), [native_parse.py](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native_parse.py)) can match them.

I think that should be added to the ATen readme. It took us (3 CS Students) three full days to figure out why our code did not compile.
